entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
